summary: This is an email chain from July 29, 2019, regarding a suicide watch and psychological observation update at the Metropolitan Correctional Center. It notes that Jeffrey Epstein was on 'Psych Observation' and pending bedspace for the Special Housing Unit (SHU). The email includes a request to be removed from the distribution list.

persons.name: Samantha
persons.role: Forensic Psychologist, Lieutenant, U.S. Public Health Service
persons.context: The sender of the email providing the suicide watch and psych observation update for the Metropolitan Correctional Center. She is a forensic psychologist with the U.S. Public Health Service assigned to the Bureau of Prisons.

persons.name: Dr. MI
persons.context: A doctor referenced in the email who is asked to remove someone from a distribution list. The initials are likely redacted or abbreviated.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: Listed as inmate #76318-054 on 'Psych Observation' and pending bedspace for the Special Housing Unit (SHU) at the Metropolitan Correctional Center.

persons.name: Lopez
persons.context: Listed as inmate #20472-038 on 'Psych Observation' at the Metropolitan Correctional Center.

events.title: Suicide Watch and Psych Observation Update
events.description: An email update on the suicide watch and psychological observation status of inmates at the Metropolitan Correctional Center, noting Jeffrey Epstein was on psych observation and pending SHU bedspace.

locations: Metropolitan Correctional Center, 150 Park Row, New York, New York 10007
keyFacts: On July 29, 2019, Jeffrey Epstein (inmate #76318-054) was listed as being on 'Psych Observation' at the Metropolitan Correctional Center in New York.
The email states Epstein was 'Pending Bedspace for SHU' (Special Housing Unit).
The email is an official update from a forensic psychologist with the U.S. Public Health Service assigned to the Bureau of Prisons.
The document is dated just over two weeks before Jeffrey Epstein's death on August 10, 2019.
